book.synopsis:
Untamed
Jo Wilder had the heart of a lion and the temper of a wildcat. And when Keane Prescott crossed her path, she bared her claws. Jo was certain her charming new boss imperiled everything she cared for, but she couldn

s kisses left her breathless, it was his tenderness that threatened to tame her heart.
